meanings.definition: The status of belonging to a particular nation.
meanings.sent1: Many different nationalities live in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: People from various nationalities attended the cultural festival.
meanings.sent3: The party was a mix of nationalities, making it a fun and diverse gathering.
meanings.sent4: In the melting pot of the city, nationalities blend together like colors on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: Learning about different nationalities can broaden our understanding of the world.

meanings.definition: A group of people sharing a common nationality.
meanings.sent1: The school has students from various nationalities.
meanings.sent2: The team is made up of players from different nationalities.
meanings.sent3: At the international food fair, each nationality showcased their traditional dishes.
meanings.sent4: The unity among different nationalities in times of need is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of nationalities in the city adds to its vibrant culture.
